title: karuNaikk-Or uruvAga
sahitya:
kauNaikkOr uruvAgak-karum kaDalin arugE arumaik-kATSi tarum ArumukhanaDi sEra vArum


anupallavi

  sharaNam aDaiya varum sakalarum uyyumAru aravaNaittu anbuDan Adarittu aruLvOn


caraNam    cancalam minjiDavE sankaTam pongiDavE tanjam aDaindiDa tanniDam Odi vandu
kenjiDum aDiyArin kEDellAm ODiDavE nenjam negizhndu anjalenru aNaivOn
